message.body: Damn it! I just heard on the news radio that our property taxes in Point Breeze (along with a hand full of other neighborhoods) are specifically targeted to go up by the city.
yea, i just was talking about that w/ my lawyer the other day. the councilman is also trying to change the new zoning code to be more like the old one bc
its "too easy" for new businesses to come into developing neighborhoods
That's fucking bullshit! ALL that bureaucracy is fucking bullshit! They're just making the city harder and harder to grow better.
its a big scandal since mayor street fooled the poor black neighborhoods into that scam he was running w/ the housing authority, now we are paying the price
